ActorTalk: W-what? How did you even find this place?
Leave a bloody trail in the wasteland, and the wolves will always come knocking, Councilwoman.
You're... C-Cerberus?!
Sabotaging development plans, attacking public officials, tampering with the network... Any one of those is enough to bring your pathetic family down for good.
And on top of that, you dared interfere with the Gray Raven Commandant on official duty... Your ancestors must be weeping.
Do you have any idea who's backing me? No... Stay away!
I couldn't care less which rats are covering for you—
Because sooner or later, I'll drag them out one by one. They can take turns introducing themselves when the time comes.
No—!
Hertha, you're finally paying the price for your stupidity.
M-Mister Mark?! Please help me...!
Oh? The big fish was so eager to meet his end that he delivered himself right to our doorstep?
A pleasure to meet you, Gray Raven Commandant, Vera. I'm truly grateful for all you've done to restore order in the Commercial District.
Cut the small talk. You're the one who's secretly working with Kurono and directing this lot to sabotage the development.
I believe there's been a misunderstanding. Hertha has had no connection to the Flourish Guild for some time now.
As the head of market expansion, Hertha Buchanan abused her position to form cliques and line her own pockets, in clear violation of the guild's core regulations.
In fact, the board voted to terminate her and blacklist her permanently even before Your Excellency was appointed Commissioner.
In other words, all her actions were personal. They have nothing to do with the Flourish Guild.
Classic. Sacrificing the pawn to save the king. Looks like your master's already cut you loose, Hertha.
I'm afraid I have no idea what you're talking about. I have another meeting shortly, so I'll have to end this conversation here.
Hertha, as your former superior, let me offer some advice: cooperate fully with the commandant's investigation. The guild will ensure the Buchanan family is looked after.
Now then, if you'll excuse me, I'll take my leave—
Go ahead and run. Just remember, no matter where you hide, I'll always catch up with you.
You'd better book a ticket out of Babylonia while you still can, before I make your worthless underlings spill everything.
I'm looking forward to seeing just how long those old bones of yours can hold out at the tip of my lance.
[PlayerName], we've got who we came for. Let's take them in.
The chairman of the Flourish Guild?
We've already uncovered evidence of the guild's illegal activities.
It's all been submitted. You won't be able to run for long.
